name: continuous_api
description: Express API for continuous integration and delivery using Any SQL Database (Postgres as example), Knex and Docker. -Always set your DB to latest version at API exec

scripts.docker-run-postgres: docker-machine ssh default docker run --name cicd_pg -p 5432:5432 -v cicd_pg:/var/lib/postgresql/data -e POSTGRES_DB=db_api -e POSTGRES_USER=developer -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=qwerty -d postgres
scripts.docker-start-postgres: docker-machine ssh default docker start cicd_pg
scripts.docker-rm-postgres: docker-machine ssh default docker rm -f cicd_pg && docker-machine ssh default docker volume rm -f cicd_pg

author: Oscar David Hernandez Hdz.
